casebody.data:
MEEMIC INSURANCE COMPANY, Plaintiff/Counterdefendant-Appellant,
v.
Louise M. FORTSON and Richard A. Fortson, Individually and as Conservator for Justin Fortson, Defendants/Counterplaintiffs-Appellees. SC: 158302
COA: 337728 Supreme Court of Michigan. May 22, 2019

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the May 29, 2018 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is GRANTED. The time allowed for oral argument shall be 20 minutes for each side. MCR 7.314(B)(1).

Persons or groups interested in the determination of the issues presented in this case may move the Court for permission to file briefs amicus curiae.
